messages.title: Make Andrew our new MP today
messages.content: For decades, the Conservatives and Labour have been taking it in turns to run Britain.

messages.title: People from across Northampton are switching to back Andrew Simpson for real change.
messages.content: If you want a lift to vote and home again please call 633009.

messages.title: It's Andrew or the Conservatives
messages.content: Today's election will be a close fight between Andrew and the Conservative candidate. Only Andrew or the Conservative can win. Labour have fallen to a very low third place.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: 3 reasons to back Andrew to win today
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Andrew has a track record of getting things done over the past 20 years. He will be a strong voice for our area and put Northampton first. Andrew has been fighting to protect Northampton from over-development. The Labour Government want to impose 40,000 new houses on our town against the wishes of local people.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's between the Lib Dems and Conservatives here.

housing.content: Andrew has been fighting to protect Northampton from over-development. The Labour Government want to impose 40,000 new houses on our town against the wishes of local people.

leaflet.personalStatement: Unlike the Conservative candidate, Andrew has a track record of getting things done over the past 20 years.

images.caption: Image of Andrew Simpson with supporters holding Liberal Democrats signs.
Image of Andrew with Nick Clegg.
